system.availability: Space Adderal. Used to focus concentration into a fixation. When taken make -10 Willpower Test to focus on desired topic. If succeed, gain +30 to Intelligence-based tests for 3d10 Rounds. If fail take -20 to all tests for 3d10 rounds, due to fixating on something else.
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
